TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract ICodeGenerator

summary.span: 定義產生程式碼的介面。

span.span: Defines an interface for generating code.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 在.NET framework 1.0 和 1.1 版中，程式碼提供者所組成的實作， ， ，和。In the .NET Framework versions 1.0 and 1.1, code providers consist of implementations of , , , and . 在[!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)]、 ， ，和方法已過時，以及的方法和直接用於類別。In the [!INCLUDE[dnprdnlong](~/includes/dnprdnlong-md.md)], the , , and methods are obsolete, and the methods of and are directly available in the class. 您應該在您的程式碼提供者實作中覆寫這些方法，並呼叫基底的方法。You should override those methods in your code provider implementation and not call the base methods. 編譯器的開發人員可以實作這個介面可讓人以動態方式產生特定語言的程式碼。Developers of compilers can implement this interface to allow people to dynamically generate code in a particular language. 這可用於各種用途，例如建立程式碼產生的精靈、 建立動態組件的內容才能進行偵錯，和使用內嵌程式碼，例如 ASP.NET 樣板化的文件。This can be used for a variety of purposes, such as creating code-generating wizards, creating dynamic assemblies with content that can be debugged, and for templated documents with embedded code, such as ASP.NET. 實作通常透過呼叫取得方法。An implementation is typically obtained through a call to the method of .

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateEscapedIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateEscapedIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateEscapedIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateEscapedIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要建立逸出識別項的字串。

span.span: The string to create an escaped identifier for.

summary.span: 為指定值建立逸出識別項。

span.span: Creates an escaped identifier for the specified value.
The escaped identifier for the value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 測試是否與保留的識別項相衝突或語言關鍵字，如果是的話，會傳回具有特定語言的逸出程式碼格式設定的對等名稱。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and if so, returns an equivalent name with language-specific escape code formatting. 這被指逸出識別項。This is referred to an escaped identifier. 逸出識別項將會包含相同`value`，但會有逸出程式碼加入至區別的關鍵字的識別項的格式。The escaped identifier will contain the same `value` but will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 兩個實作的範例是前面`value`與"@"或方括號`value`與"["和"]"。Two implementation examples are preceding the `value` with "@" or bracketing the `value` with "[" and "]".

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 針對繼承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public string CreateValidIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance string CreateValidIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function CreateValidIdentifier (value As String) As String
public: System::String ^ CreateValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要產生有效識別項的字串。

span.span: The string to generate a valid identifier for.

summary.span: 為指定值建立有效的識別項。

span.span: Creates a valid identifier for the specified value.
A valid identifier for the specified value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 測試是否與保留的識別項衝突或語言關鍵字，並傳回有效的識別項名稱不會衝突。 tests whether the identifier conflicts with reserved or language keywords, and returns a valid identifier name that does not conflict. 傳回的識別項將會包含相同`value`但如果它與衝突保留或語言關鍵字，就必須逸出程式碼加入至區別的關鍵字的識別項的格式。The returned identifier will contain the same `value` but, if it conflicts with reserved or language keywords, will have escape code formatting added to differentiate the identifier from the keyword. 一般而言，如果需要修改這個值，會傳回值前面會加底線"_"上。Typically, if the value needs modification, value is returned preceded by an underscore "_".

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 針對繼承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool IsValidIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool IsValidIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Function IsValidIdentifier (value As String) As Boolean
public: bool IsValidIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要測試做為有效識別項的值。

span.span: The value to test for being a valid identifier.

summary.span: 取得指示數值，表示指定的值是否為目前語言的有效識別項。

span.span: Gets a value that indicates whether the specified value is a valid identifier for the current language.

returns.span: 如果 參數是有效的識別項，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the parameter is a valid identifier; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法會測試是否為有效的識別項。This method tests whether an identifier is valid. 當實作在衍生類別中，設計方法，即可測試值傳遞給它，並傳回`true`只有值符合語言的規則，而且不會以關鍵字衝突。When implementing in a derived class, design the method to test the value passed to it, and return `true` only if the value fits the rules of the language and does not conflict with a keyword.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 針對繼承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool Supports (System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport supports);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool Supports(valuetype System.CodeDom.Compiler.GeneratorSupport supports) cil managed
Public Function Supports (supports As GeneratorSupport) As Boolean
public: bool Supports(System::CodeDom::Compiler::GeneratorSupport supports);

param.name: supports
param.span: 要測試的產生器能力。

span.span: The capabilities to test the generator for.

summary.span: 取得值，指出產生器是否支援指定 物件所表示的語言功能。

span.span: Gets a value indicating whether the generator provides support for the language features represented by the specified object.

returns.span: 如果支援指定的能力，則為 ，否則為 。

span.span: if the specified capabilities are supported; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法可以呼叫具有數旗標，一次，以加入一組適當的功能旗標，以及二進位檔的一組功能來測試"Or"運算子 (|)。This method can be called with a number of flags at once to test for a set of capabilities by joining a set of appropriate capability flags together with a binary "Or" operator (|).

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

MemberSignature.Value: public void ValidateIdentifier (string value);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ValidateIdentifier(string value) cil managed
Public Sub ValidateIdentifier (value As String)
public: void ValidateIdentifier(System::String ^ value);

param.name: value
param.span: 要驗證的識別項。

span.span: The identifier to validate.

summary.span: 如果指定值不是有效的識別項會擲回例外狀況。

span.span: Throws an exception if the specified value is not a valid identifier.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 而不是傳回值，這個方法擲回例外狀況，如果方法實作中根據指定的識別項無效。Rather than returning a value, this method throws an exception if the specified identifier is not valid according to the method implementation. 例外狀況通常是。Typically, the exception is an . 這個方法可讓程式碼產生器實作此方法以產生無效的識別項的值為基礎的資訊錯誤訊息。This method enables a code generator that implements this method to produce an informative error message based upon the value of an invalid identifier.

span.span: The identifier is not valid.

permission.span: 針對完全信任立即呼叫者。

span.span: for full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 這個成員無法供部分信任的程式碼使用。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted code.

permission.span: 針對繼承者完全信任。

span.span: for full trust for inheritors.

permission.span: 這個成員無法繼承由部分信任程式碼。

span.span: This member cannot be inherited by partially trusted code.
